participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: thoughtful, nurturing, and enjoys deep conversations.
participant_1.background: i spent a decade working in the human services field. my father used to work for home depot. i've a son who is in junior high school. horror movies are my favorites.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: energetic, sociable, and loves to have fun.
participant_2.background: i am a party animal. my favorite movie is mean girls. i'm deathly afraid of heights. i own a cat and a dog.

content.text: hi how are you today? i'm well.
I'm great....the weather's a mess though
what are you up to? i'm about to watch a movie.
do you have any pets? i've a son.
